results.original_title: Shrek in the Swamp Karaoke Dance Party
results.overview: Shrek and his friends enjoy themselves with some Karaoke partying.
results.title: Shrek in the Swamp Karaoke Dance Party

results.overview: The Tramp is an escaped convict who is mistaken as a pastor in a small town church.
results.title: The Pilgrim

results.overview: Hans invites his friends to a lake house to celebrate his success as a writer. But after a weekend of lies and passion, no one is the same anymore.
results.title: Die Glücklichen

results.overview: A skateboarder named Orpheus, his girlfriend Eurydice and their friends journey to Hell to stop television signals that are brainwashing America.
results.title: Shredder Orpheus

results.overview: A sportswriter who marries a fashion designer discovers that their mutual interests are few, although each has an intriguing past which makes the other jealous.
results.title: Designing Woman

results.overview: Two young men meet in a twin bereavement support group and form an unlikely bromance.
results.title: Twinless

results.overview: Criminology student Chloe fakes her own death to break into a morgue, in order to retrieve a piece of evidence that ties her younger brother to a crime gone wrong. Once inside, she discovers that a sadistic coroner is using the corpses for his sick and twisted business, and when he realises that Chloe still has a pulse, a terrifying game of cat and mouse ensues.
results.title: Play Dead

results.overview: Alessia, a TV showgirl, tries to win the favor of an official. Amalia, a morning show host, satisfies the masochistic director in order to go to prime time. Stefania "works hard" to act in a risqué film by a famous director, but the part is stolen from her by her friend Beatrice, apparently only devoted to her studies.
results.title: Crazy Underwear

results.overview: A female American reporter searches for her missing brother against the backdrop of violence and human smuggling across the US/Mexican border.
results.title: Border Run

results.overview: When a synthetically-altered street drug is discarded in the woods by a drug dealer during a car chase with police, the fallout proves nothing less than horrific when an innocent raccoon eats it, transforming it into a nightmarish killing machine straight from the bowels of hell. With unsuspecting campers, tourists, and residents of a mountain community all in close proximity to the epicenter, no one is safe from the monster's unrelenting rampage.
results.title: Crackcoon

results.overview: Vijay, The prodigal son of business tycoon Rajendran agrees to take over the reins of the business, much to the chagrin of his brothers. But can Vijay prove himself to be a worthy varisu and also reunite his now-broken family?
results.title: Varisu

results.overview: A young mother and her twin sons move into a rural house that's marked for death.
results.title: Sinister 2

results.overview: Charlie is a former classical pianist who has changed his name and now plays jazz in a grimy Paris bar. When Charlie's brothers, Richard and Chico, surface and ask for Charlie's help while on the run from gangsters they have scammed, he aids their escape. Soon Charlie and Lena, a waitress at the same bar, face trouble when the gangsters arrive, looking for his brothers.
results.title: Shoot the Piano Player

results.overview: A transgender woman returns – with her two male lovers – to her family home in the countryside to look after her dying mother.
results.title: Wild Side

results.overview: Chris, a sexy teenager who appears mostly bare-breasted on the French Riviera, has a crush on Romain, her mother's lover. In reaction to her inability to attract his attention, she experiments with other risque affairs.
results.title: Year of the Jellyfish

results.overview: A pilot movie dealing with the day-to-day workings of God herself, here threatening to destroy Las Vegas if six righteous people cannot be found there in seven days, and it's all up to an eager-to-please young angel, a frustrated clerk-typist in the heavenly music department, to try to hold off the devastation while disguised as a mortal.
results.title: Human Feelings

results.original_title: 機界戦隊ゼンカイジャー THE MOVIE 赤い戦い！ オール戦隊大集会！！
results.overview: The 2021 Super Sentai, Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger, debuts in a movie! Previous generations of monsters show up but team leader Zenkaiser won't let them have their way! Previous generations of Red Rangers run into battle too! Zenkaiser isn't a Red Ranger, but does that even make sense? With the power of the Machine World, he'll defeat them at Full-Force Full-Throttle!
results.title: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger The Movie: Red Battle! All Sentai Rally!!

results.overview: A depressed man moves back in with his parents following a recent heartbreak and finds himself with two women.
results.title: Two Lovers

results.overview: After being fired from his bull breeding job without proper compensation, Franco steals a world-class bull from his former employer and smuggles it to Hungary, planning to sell it for a large sum of money.
results.title: Il toro

results.overview: Retirees Karin, Gerhard and Philippa are not in the mood for Nordic walking and seniors' courses at the university. When Philippa, who is living life to the full as Leonie's godmother, helps the two to unexpected grandparenthood, they suddenly have two "lively" god-grandchildren to look after, a huge bouncy castle standing in the garden and Lego bricks stuck to their feet.
results.title: Granny Nanny
